welcomeMessage: Where direct democracy shapes self-regulated communities. Discuss, propose, and vote to build our future together.
seedSuccessDescRefresh: Database seeded! You may need to refresh the page to see changes.
login.title: Login to Kratia Forums
login.description: Enter your credentials to access your account.
login.descDefault: Enter your email and password to access your account.
login.descPendingAdmission: The admission application for {{username}} is currently under review by the community.
login.descEmailNotVerified: A verification link has been sent to {{email}}. Please verify your email before logging in.
login.error.profileNotFound: User profile not found in our records after successful authentication.
login.error.profileIssue: There was an issue loading your user profile.
login.error.userNotFound: No user found with this email.
login.error.invalidCredentials: Invalid credentials. Please check your email and password.
login.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
login.error.tooManyRequests: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
login.error.googleAuthFailed: Google Sign-In failed. Please try again.
login.error.googleProfileIssue: Issue with your profile after Google Sign-In: {{reason}}
login.error.googleAccountExists: An account already exists with the same email address but different sign-in credentials. Sign in using a provider associated with this email address.
login.error.googleGenericFail: Google Sign-In failed. Please try again later.
login.error.invalidCredentialsGeneric: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
signup.title: Join Kratia Forums
signup.description: Apply for membership by creating an account and presenting yourself to the community.
signup.presentationPlaceholder: Tell us about yourself and why you'd like to join Kratia Forums (min. 50 characters). This will be part of your admission request.
signup.error.presentationTooShort: Your presentation must be at least 50 characters long.
signup.error.presentationTooShortGoogle: Please fill in your presentation (min. 50 characters) before signing up with Google.
signup.error.mustAgreeToTerms: You must agree to the terms and conditions.
signup.error.mustAgreeToTermsGoogle: Please agree to the terms and conditions before signing up with Google.
signup.error.emailInUse: This email address is already in use. Please try a different email or log in.
signup.error.weakPassword: Password is too weak. It should be at least 6 characters long.
signup.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
signup.error.googleSignupFailed: Google Sign-Up failed. Please try again.
signup.error.userSanctioned: User {{username}} is currently sanctioned and cannot apply.
signup.error.googleUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred during Google Sign-Up.
signup.error.googleAccountExists: An account already exists with the same email address but different sign-in credentials. Sign in using a provider associated with this email address.
signup.error.googleGenericFail: Google Sign-Up failed. Please try again later.
signup.toast.step1CompleteDesc: A verification link has been sent to your email. Please verify your email and then log in to complete your admission request.
signup.toast.presentationRequiredDesc: Please write your presentation before signing up with Google.
signup.toast.agreementRequiredDesc: Please agree to the terms and conditions.
signup.toast.accountExistsDesc: An account with this email already exists. Please log in.
forgotPassword.descDefault: No worries! Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.descEmailSent: If an account exists for {{email}}, you will receive a password reset link shortly. Please check your inbox (and spam folder).
forgotPassword.checkSpamNote: If you don't see the email, please check your spam or junk folder.
forgotPassword.error.genericFail: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again.
forgotPassword.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
forgotPassword.toast.emailSentDesc: If an account exists for {{email}}, a reset link has been sent.
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.title: Verify Your Email
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.descri: A verification link has been sent to {{email}}. Please check your inbox (and spam folder) to activate your Kratia account.
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.toComp: to complete your admission request to the community.
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.title: Application Submitted!
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.descrip: Your application to join Kratia Forums has been successfully submitted. It is now pending review and votation by the community.
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.whatNex: You will be notified of the outcome. In the meantime, you can explore public content as a visitor.
confirmPage.default.title: Confirmation
confirmPage.default.description: Please check your email or application status.
sanctionedPage.title: Access Restricted
sanctionedPage.alertDescription: You are unable to participate in the community until your sanction ends.
sanctionedPage.optionsInfo: You can view public content as a visitor or log out.
adminPanel.title: Admin Panel
adminPanel.description: Manage users, forums, categories, and other site settings.

adminPanel.deleteForumDialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete this forum?
adminPanel.deleteForumDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the forum "{{forumName}}"?
This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the forum. Threads and posts within it will be orphaned.

adminCreateCategory.description: Define a new category to organize forums.

profileEdit.notificationPrefs.title: Notification Preferences
profileEdit.notificationPrefs.descriptio: Choose how you want to be notified about activity on the forum.
profileEdit.notificationPrefs.newReplyTo: Receive a web notification when someone replies to a thread you started.
profileEdit.notificationPrefs.votationCo: Receive a web notification when a votation you proposed concludes.
profileEdit.notificationPrefs.postReacti: Receive a web notification when someone reacts to one of your posts.
profileEdit.notificationPrefs.votationCo: Receive a web notification when a votation you participated in (but didn't propose) concludes.

proposeConstitution.form.justificationPl: Explain why these changes are being proposed and their expected impact.
proposeConstitution.form.proposedTextPla: Paste the entire current constitution here and make your modifications.
proposeConstitution.form.proposedTextHel: Edit the text below with your proposed changes. The entire text will be part of the proposal.
proposeConstitution.importantNotice.desc: Submitting this proposal will create a public votation in the Agora. Ensure your proposal is clear and well-justified.
